ing: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "Cooked rice, fruit and whipped topping --  sounds strange, tastes great!  Adjust the ingredients to taste. The finished dish should be the consistency of pudding. Try adding pecans and walnuts. At Christmas I put a few drops of food coloring in the whipped topping."
ins:
In a medium saucepan bring water to a boil. Add rice and stir. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
In a medium bowl, blend 1/2 the fruit cocktail and the whipped cream. Drain any remaining fluid from the rice and mix 1/2 into the bowl. Continue mixing in the remaining fruit cocktail and rice until the desired consistency has been attained.
